-- Generated by CSharp.lua Compiler
local System = System
local ET = ET
local UnityEngine = UnityEngine
local ET
System.import(function (out)
  ET = out.ET
end)
System.namespace("ET", function (namespace)
  namespace.class("AfterUnitCreate_CreateUnitView", function (namespace)
    local Run
    Run = function (this, args)
      return System.async(function (async, this, args)
        -- Unit Viewå±‚
        local resourcesComponent = ET.Game.getScene():GetComponent(ET.ResourcesComponent)
        local bundleGameObject = System.cast(UnityEngine.GameObject, resourcesComponent:GetAsset("Unit.unity3d", "Unit"))
        local prefab = ET.GameObjectHelper.Get(bundleGameObject, "Skeleton", UnityEngine.GameObject)

        local go = UnityEngine.Object.Instantiate(prefab, UnityEngine.GameObject)
        UnityEngine.GameObject.DontDestroyOnLoad(go)
        args.Unit.GameObject = go
        args.Unit:AddComponent(ET.AnimatorComponent)
      end, nil, this, args)
    end
    return {
      base = function (out)
        return {
          out.ET.AEvent_1(out.ET.EventType.AfterUnitCreate)
        }
      end,
      Run = Run
    }
  end)
end)
